ConvAnalysisTopic.name: ConvAnalysisTopic
ConvAnalysisTopic.description: Represents a topic generated from the Sales Signals refresh or run. For example, a product experiencing issues due to high pricing could be a topic identified through the analysis of multiple calls.

CallPercentage.description: Required. The percentage of calls that apply to a topic, out of the total number of calls that were analyzed.

Category.description: Required. A classification or grouping used to filter topics. This field is used in conjunction with Keyword.

ConvAnalysisSummaryId.description: Required. The conversation analysis summary associated with the topic.

GenerationsIdentifier.description: Required. The ID used to track the LLM-generated response for feedback purposes.

Keyword.description: Required. A specific word used in conjunction with Category to filter topics. For example, Product:Salesforce, where the keyword is Salesforce.

MentionCount.description: Required. The number of call insights associated with the topic.

Order.description: Required. A numerical value used to sort topics in a sequence.

Summary.description: Required. A detailed explanation of the topic.

Title.description: Required. The title of the topic that describes it.

TopicSentiment.description: The sentiment of the topic, whether itâ€™s negative, neutral, or positive.

TotalCalls.description: The total number of calls analyzed for the topic.

TotalCallsForCategoryKeyword.description: The total number of calls analyzed for category:keyword. Multiple topics can be under a single category:keyword.

TotalMentionsForCategoryKeyword.description: The total number of mentions analyzed for category:keyword.

TurnIdentifier.description: UUID that is generated and used to track a group of LLM-generated content.
